items.title: Error when building
items.body:
When I try to build with
```
cargo build
```
It gives error:
```
me @ ~/code/src/paritytech/fleetwood - [master] $ cargo build
    Updating registry `https://github.com/rust-lang/crates.io-index`
 Downloading parity-hash v1.2.2                                                                                               
 Downloading bigint v4.4.1                                                                                                    
 Downloading pwasm-abi v0.1.10                                                                                                
 Downloading uint v0.3.0                                                                                                      
 Downloading pwasm-std v0.10.0                                                                                                
 Downloading pwasm-alloc v0.4.0                                                                                               
   Compiling proc-macro2 v0.4.20                                                                                              
   Compiling unicode-xid v0.1.0
   Compiling crunchy v0.1.6
   Compiling void v1.0.2
   Compiling wee_alloc v0.4.2
   Compiling serde v1.0.79
   Compiling libc v0.2.43
   Compiling memory_units v0.4.0
   Compiling byteorder v1.2.6
   Compiling cfg-if v0.1.5
   Compiling rustc-hex v2.0.1
   Compiling version_check v0.1.5
   Compiling rlibc v1.0.0
   Compiling either v1.5.0
   Compiling metrohash v1.0.5
   Compiling unreachable v1.0.0
   Compiling pwasm-libc v0.2.0
   Compiling lazy_static v1.1.0
   Compiling uint v0.3.0
   Compiling tiny-keccak v1.4.2
error[E0554]: #![feature] may not be used on the stable release channel
   --> /Users/me/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/wee_alloc-0.4.2/src/lib.rs:228:1
    |
228 | #![feature(alloc, allocator_api, core_intrinsics)]
    | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

error: aborting due to previous error

For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0554`.
error: Could not compile `wee_alloc`.
warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish...
error: build failed
```

System:
`cargo --version` cargo 1.29.0 (524a578d7 2018-08-05)
`rustc --version` rustc 1.29.1 (b801ae664 2018-09-20)
